verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Chisel <WH6458> you two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first <WH7223>: and I will write <WH3789> upon these tablets <WH3871> the words <WH1697> that were in the first <WH7223> tablets <WH3871>, which you broke <WH7665>.

And be ready <WH3559> in the morning <WH1242>, and come up <WH5927> in the morning <WH1242> unto mountain <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, and present <WH5324> yourself there to me in the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022>.

And no man <WH376> shall come up <WH5927> with you <WH408>, neither let any man <WH376> be seen <WH7200> throughout all the mountain <WH2022>; neither let the flocks <WH6629> nor herds <WH1241> feed <WH7462> before <WH4136> that mountain <WH2022>.

And he chiseled <WH6458> two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first <WH7223>; and Moses <WH4872> rose up early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and went up <WH5927> unto mountain <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> him <WH3947>, and took in his hand <WH3027> the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone <WH68>.
And the Lord <WH3068> descended <WH3381> in the cloud <WH6051>, and stood <WH3320> with him there <WH7121>, and proclaimed the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>.

And the Lord <WH3068> passed by <WH5674> before him <WH6440>, and proclaimed <WH7121>, The Lord <WH3068>, The Lord <WH3068> God <WH410>, merciful <WH7349> and gracious <WH2587>, longsuffering <WH750>, and abundant <WH7227> in goodness <WH2617> and truth <WH571>,

Keeping <WH5341> mercy <WH2617> for thousands <WH505>, forgiving <WH5375> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression <WH6588> and sin <WH2403>, and that will by no means <WH5352> clear <WH5352> the guilty <WH6485>; visiting the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon the sons <WH1121>, and upon the children <WH1121>'s sons <WH8029>, unto the third and to the fourth generation <WH7256>.
And Moses <WH4872> made hurry <WH4116>, and bowed his head <WH6915> toward the earth <WH776>, and worshiped <WH7812>.

And he said <WH559>, If now I have found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in your sight <WH5869>, O Lord <WH136>, let my Lord <WH136>, I pray you <WH3212>, go among <WH7130> us <WH7186>; for it is a stiffnecked people <WH5971>; and pardon <WH5545> our iniquity <WH5771> and our sin <WH2403>, and take us for your inheritance <WH5157>.

And he said <WH559>, Behold <WH3772>, I make a covenant <WH1285>: before all your people <WH5971> I will do <WH6213> marvels <WH6381>, such as have not been done <WH1254> in all the earth <WH776>, nor in any nation <WH1471>: and all the people <WH5971> among <WH7130> which you are shall see <WH7200> the work <WH4639> of the Lord <WH3068>: for it is a terrible thing <WH3372> that I will do with you <WH6213>.

Observe <WH8104> you that which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>: behold <WH1644>, I drive out before <WH6440> you the Amorite <WH567>, and the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>.

Take care <WH8104> to yourself <WH3772>, lest you make a covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> where you go <WH935>, lest it be for a snare <WH4170> in the middle of you <WH7130>:
But you shall destroy <WH5422> their altars <WH4196>, break <WH7665> their images <WH4676>, and cut down <WH3772> their groves <WH842>:
For you shall worship <WH7812> no other <WH312> god <WH410>: for the Lord <WH3068>, whose name <WH8034> is Jealous <WH7067>, is a jealous <WH7067> God <WH410>:

Lest you make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>, and they go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> their gods <WH430>, and do sacrifice <WH2076> unto their gods <WH430>, and one call <WH7121> you <WH398>, and you eat of his sacrifice <WH2077>;

And you take <WH3947> of their daughters <WH1323> unto your sons <WH1121>, and their daughters <WH1323> go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> their gods <WH430>, and make <WH2181> your sons <WH1121> go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> their gods <WH430>.
You shall make <WH6213> you no cast metal <WH4541> gods <WH430>.

The feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682> shall you keep <WH8104>. Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>, as I commanded <WH6680> you <WH4150>, in the time of the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24>: for in the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24> you came out <WH3318> from Egypt <WH4714>.
All that opens <WH6363> the womb <WH7358> is mine <WH6363>; and every firstborn among your cattle <WH4735>, whether ox <WH7794> or sheep <WH7716>, that is male <WH2142>.

But the firstborn <WH6363> of an donkey <WH2543> you shall redeem <WH6299> with a lamb <WH7716>: and if you redeem <WH6299> him not <WH6202>, then shall you break his neck. All the firstborn <WH1060> of your sons <WH1121> you shall redeem <WH6299>. And none shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> me empty <WH7387>.
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you shall work <WH5647>, but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> you shall rest <WH7673>: in plowing time <WH2758> and in harvest <WH7105> you shall rest <WH7673>.

And you shall observe <WH6213> the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620>, of the firstfruits <WH1061> of wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105>, and the feast <WH2282> of harvest <WH614> at the year <WH8141>'s end <WH8622>.
Three times <WH6471> in the year <WH8141> shall all your men children <WH2138> appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH113> God <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.

For I will cast out <WH3423> the nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> you <WH7337>, and enlarge your borders <WH1366>: neither shall any man <WH376> desire <WH2530> your land <WH776>, when you shall go up <WH5927> to appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> thrice <WH6471> in the year <WH8141>.

You shall not offer <WH7819> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with yeast <WH2557>; neither shall the sacrifice <WH2077> of the feast <WH2282> of the passover <WH6453> be left <WH3885> unto the morning <WH1242>.

The first <WH7225> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of your land <WH127> you shall bring <WH935> unto the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>. You shall not boil <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in his mother <WH517>'s milk <WH2461>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Write <WH3789> you these words <WH1697>: for after the tone <WH6310> of these words <WH1697> I have made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with you and with Israel <WH3478>.

And he was there with the Lord <WH3068> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>; he did neither eat <WH398> bread <WH3899>, nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>. And he wrote <WH3789> upon the tablets <WH3871> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285>, the ten <WH6235> commandments <WH1697>.

And it came to pass <WH4872>, when Moses came down <WH3381> from mountain <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> with the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of testimony <WH5715> in Moses <WH4872>' hand <WH3027>, when he came down <WH3381> from the mountain <WH2022>, that Moses <WH4872> knew <WH3045> not that the skin <WH5785> of his face <WH6440> shone <WH7160> while he talked with him <WH1696>.

And when Aaron <WH175> and all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> Moses <WH4872>, behold <WH5785>, the skin of his face <WH6440> shone <WH7160>; and they were afraid <WH3372> to come near him <WH5066>.
And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> unto them <WH175>; and Aaron and all the rulers <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> returned <WH7725> unto him <WH4872>: and Moses talked with them <WH1696>.

And afterward <WH310> all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came near <WH5066>: and he gave them in commandment <WH6680> all that the Lord <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> with him in mountain <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>.
And when Moses <WH4872> had done <WH3615> speaking <WH1696> with them <WH5414>, he put a veil <WH4533> on his face <WH6440>.

But when Moses <WH4872> went in <WH935> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> to speak <WH1696> with him <WH5493>, he took the veil <WH4533> off <WH5493>, until he came out <WH3318>. And he came out <WH3318>, and spoke <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> that which he was commanded <WH6680>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> the face <WH6440> of Moses <WH4872>, that the skin <WH5785> of Moses <WH4872>' face <WH6440> shone <WH7160>: and Moses <WH4872> put <WH7725> the veil <WH4533> upon his face <WH6440> again <WH7725>, until he went <WH935> in to speak with him <WH1696>.
